6. False Cause: Blaming the Biden administration for the situation without providing concrete evidence links two unrelated events (Chinese spy base in Cuba and DOJ silencing Miles Guo).

10. Straw Man: Creating a false narrative that the Biden administration ignored warnings and jailed those who called them out shifts the focus away from the real issues at hand.
